In March 2023, following our disposition of our investment in JUUL, we filed a motion to dismiss the complaint.  In June 2023, the FTC dismissed the action as no longer in the public interest. Also as of July 29, 2024, 17 putative class action lawsuits have been filed against Altria and JUUL in the U.S. District Court for the Northern District of California.  In November 2020, these lawsuits were consolidated into three complaints (one on behalf of direct purchasers, one on behalf of indirect purchasers and one on behalf of indirect resellers).
